channel.title: Internships on Shubham Sharma
channel.description: Recent content in Internships on Shubham Sharma

item.title: 1: TCS Innovation Lab(5 Weeks)
item.description: Read different research papers for Session Based Recommendation Systems of TCS research including STAN, NISER and other attention networks like HAN. The goal of my work was to come up with high-fidelity simulations of user behavior to enable better evaluation of Deep RL based Recommender Systems.

item.title: 2: AIRA MATRIX| Sun Pharmaceutical Industries Limited(10 Weeks)
item.description: Analysis of different types of autoencoders(Contractive, Convolutional, Denoising, Sparse, Variational) Comparison of different ILSVRC winning classifiers like VGGNet and ResNet on MNIST dataset. Identification and Segmentation of nuclei using Superpixels and architectures like SegNet and U-Net. Segmentation on Uterus data to extract the blood vessels using SegNet architecture on NDPI images. github links(Autoencoders, Transfer leaning, Segmentation, Superpixels, Post Processing, Classification
